package.name: g1_fullbody_controller
package.description: This package implements a fullbody controller for the Unitree G1 humanoid robot with Inspire hands (53 joints) using a neural network policy. The policy was trained using Isaac Lab with the Isaac-Velocity-Flat-G1-Inspire-v0 task. This package requires PyTorch 2.3.0 and higher, please refer to the PyTorch website for installation instructions.
